Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##49 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##50}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Data.String_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Data.String
 6: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: measure stringlen :: a -> GHC.Types.Int
10: 
11: assume Data.String.fromString
12:     ::  forall a. Data.String.IsString a
13:     =>  i : [GHC.Types.Char]
14:     ->  { o : a | i ~~ o && len i == stringlen o }
15: @-}
